headline: Is It Worth Investing in Coinbase Global (COIN) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Coinbase Global (COIN) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Coinbase Stock Is No Longer at the Mercy of Bitcoin. Cathie Wood’s ARK Is Buying.
summary: Coinbase Global  stock has been hammered in recent months as it’s been at the mercy of the brutal Bitcoin selloff.  In fact, the shares’ 16% post-earnings surge Friday—even as cryptocurrency prices remained relatively subdued—is a sign it could start moving independently of volatile digital asset prices.  Coinbase  doubled its total trading volume and crypto trading market share in 2025, while its Coinbase One monthly membership hit 1 million subscriptions.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Rise As Inflation Worries Ease
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Feb, 16 2026 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with benchmark contracts on the S&P 500, Dow and Nasdaq all in the green, as investors react to softer January inflation. Headline US CPI sits at 2.4% with core CPI at 2.5%, which means the cost of living is still rising but now closer to the Federal Reserve’s comfort zone. The US 10 year Treasury yield is around 4.07%, a move that signals cheaper borrowing costs may be edging...
